p: In addition to different portions of fruit, some other parts of the walnut tree have recently gained considerable interest. For this reason, many studies have reported the total phenolic and flavonoid contents of other parts of the walnut tree, especially the data related to the leaf are considerable. However, extensive research on TFOC and TCTC are rare, or have not been reported for a number of other constituents such as TFAC and THTC (see Table 4 for further details).
